text: Duma Gideon Boko (born 31 December 1969) is a Botswana politician and lawyer. He has been the 6th and current President of Botswana since 2024. He has been the leader of the Umbrella for Democratic Change since 2012. He was the Leader of the Opposition in the National Assembly from 2014 to 2019. Boko ran as the alliance's president in Botswana's general elections in 2014 and 2019. Botswana 2019 General Elections Report - IEC ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Botswana Category:Current national leaders
title: Duma Boko
